Title: Data Vulnerability
Description: A vulnerability has been detected in the nanobots' software! This security breach is very serious and requires the universal failsafe to be triggered. This will cease production and any ongoing operations until a solution is found.

Title: Calls For Aid
Description: As word has spread of NanoMed's growth, more people outside of Hawaii have began wondering about more universal support for NanoMed aid around the nation.

Title: Rallies in Hawaii
Description: Hawaii residents have begun to feel like NanoMed aid may be too expensive. There has been increasing public outcry and calls for healthcare reform for the NanoMed plan that have started attracting attention from even out of state.
